title: When Braum saves you from Jinx ult.

replies.body: {{champion:201}} is a pretty cool guy... he fights red team and doesn't afraid of anything.

5/7
niceme.me (this is an actual website!)
lol
Not as good as randomly blocking a Jinx ult with full health as you're walking to farm another lane as your ally retreats, twice.
pretty sure it's from halo legends.
almost thought it was RvB season 14
I prefer not to talk about that.
Is it just me or is Chief's arm literally phasing through his leg there
Okay, then is [Insert name of armored soldier]'s arm going through is leg :P
My brother is a journalist- naming people right is a big thing for him and has subsequently rubbed off onto me.
